title: SCCP-93:  Increase The Circuit Breaker Deviation Factor to 1.8 from 1.6
body: [SCCP-93](https://sips.synthetix.io/SCCP/sccp-93) proposes to raise the `priceDeviationThresholdFactor` to 1.8 from 1.6, in order to re-enable trading on sEOS, are you in favor of this decision?
author: 0xDF0b4944f09807b6Cd38aFD33169cce1364acaCf
